attributes.action: keep our homes as our castles with no individual given the right by Governement to enter them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The intoduction of Licensed Home Inspectors from June 2007 is an ill thought out attempt by Government to allow access to private homes in order to access their value for purposes of increasing by stealth Council Tax banding. As such this should be dropped immediatly and the whole question dealt with on a consultation basis to begin with at local then regional and national level. The whole idea of Government representatives being allowed access to private homes is repugnant in the extreme.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
